product_name: Rossignol Trixie Downhill Skis with Bindings - Women's - 2014/2015
long_description: Playful, sassy and tough, this women's all-mountain freestyle ski is designed for up-and-coming rippers looking to take a spin in the terrain park and explore the best of the resort.
short_description: Playful, sassy and tough, this women's all-mountain freestyle ski is designed for up-and-coming rippers looking to take a spin in the terrain park and explore the best of the resort.
